content: This orphaned English sentence was translated on Tatoeba into 14 languages, but the translator could not adopt it because he is not a native English speaker.
translations: ita:Questa frase inglese orfana è stata tradotta su Tatoeba in 14 lingue, ma il traduttore non ha potuto adottarla perché no
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
